rooms.description: Open-plan living area with exposed concrete finishes, large windows for natural light. Vastu alignment with east for positive energy.
Separate dining space adjoining the kitchen. West facing window ensures proper ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Modern farmhouse style with integrated storage and open design. Windows on north for balanced energy flow.
Private bedroom with a small balcony. Designed facing the east for auspicious entry of positive energies.
Second bedroom for joint family members. Oriented to ensure privacy and calm environment.
Third bedroom with Vastu-compliant layout including window orientation to balance energy.
Fourth bedroom with minimalistic design for additional family member or guest use. Proper natural ventilation is ensured.
Fifth bedroom; designed with open spaces and east-west window orientations following Vastu recommendations.
Sixth bedroom, ensuring a quiet space for relaxation. Windows are placed to promote natural light.
Common bathroom with Vastu compliant design and efficient water flow management using north-west windows.
Study area integrated into the living space for work or study. Windows on north-east to promote concentration.

openings.description: Primary entrance facing west to align with plot orientation and Vastu principles.
Service door for deliveries and maintenance, designed to ensure minimal disruption to the main space.
Staircase leading to rooftop terrace. The roof is designed with a Brutalist style retaining concrete elements while providing open space.

roof_details.description: Rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and space for family gatherings, following Vastu principles by ensuring alignment of cardinal directions.
